com.illumina.basespace

Interface ApiClient


  • public interface ApiClient
    Defines the operations that can be performed against the BaseSpace API
    Author:
    bking

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GetAppResultResponse createAppResult(ProjectCompact project, String name, String description, URI hrefAppSession, ReferenceCompact[] references)
      To create or change an AppResult within a specific project.
      GetProjectResponse createProject(String projectName)
      Create a project for the current user

      Permissions: CREATE PROJECTS access to the user's data

      Download the contents of a file

      Permissions: READ access to the Run, Sample, or AppResult to which the file belongs
      GetAppResultResponse getAppResult(String id)
      Retrieve a specific AppResult by its Id

      Permissions: BROWSE access to the AppResult either directly or via access to a project containing the AppResult
      ListAppResultsResponse getAppResults(AppSessionCompact appSession, QueryParams params)
      Returns a list of the AppResults that were created by an AppSession

      Permissions: A valid access token for the user
      ListAppResultsResponse getAppResults(ProjectCompact project, QueryParams params)
      Retrieve a list of AppResults within a specific project Id

      Permissions: BROWSE access to the Project
      GetAppSessionResponse getAppSession(String id)
      Retrieve an appsession by its Id

      Permissions: BROWSE access to any containing AppResults gives visibility to appsession, the clientid and clientsecret must match the appsession's application

      Permissions: READ access to the sample to which the source file belongs

      Permissions: READ access to the sample to which the source file belongs

                                  throws ResourceNotFoundException,
                                         ResourceForbiddenException

        Permissions: BROWSE access to the AppResult either directly or via access to a project containing the AppResult

        id - appresult id

        the appresult single item response
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException
        ResourceForbiddenException

      • createAppResult

        GetAppResultResponse createAppResult(ProjectCompact project,
                                   String name,
                                   String description,
                                   URI hrefAppSession,
                                   ReferenceCompact[] references)
        To create or change an AppResult within a specific project. A new appresult is created within this project

        Permissions: WRITE access to the project within which the AppResult is, or will be, contained
        Parameters:
        project - project which will contain the appresult
        name - Name of the AppResult (required)
        description - Brief decription of the AppResult
        hrefAppSession - Specifies a location for the AppSession for the new AppResult. This field may only be set if the status parameter of this AppSession is neither complete nor aborted, and also the application field must match.
        references - The Reference field shows this AppResult's inputs or relationship to other resources in BaseSpace
        Returns:
        the appresult single item response

      • getAppSession

        GetAppSessionResponse getAppSession(String id)
                                    throws ResourceNotFoundException,
                                           ResourceForbiddenException
        Retrieve an appsession by its Id

        Permissions: BROWSE access to any containing AppResults gives visibility to appsession, the clientid and clientsecret must match the appsession's application
        Parameters:
        id - appsession id
        Returns:
        the appsession single item response
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException
        ResourceForbiddenException

      • getAppSessions

        ListAppSessionsResponse getAppSessions(String appId,
                                     String status,
                                     QueryParams params)
        A list of the current user's AppSessions
        Parameters:
        appId - The Id of the Application that created this AppSession
        status - To Filter the list by Status of the AppSession, this query parameter can be used
        params - optional (can be null) parameters to limit the scope of results
        Returns:
        the appsession list response

      • updateAppSession

        GetAppSessionResponse updateAppSession(AppSessionCompact appsession,
                                     AppSessionStatus status,
                                     String statusSummary)
        Change the current status of the AppSession by its Id

        Permissions: WRITE access to the referenced AppResults through its parent Project
        Parameters:
        appsession - appsession which will be updated
        status - Status of the AppSession, the Samples or AppResults created will inherit this value. This parameter is REQUIRED otherwise an error will be thrown
        statusSummary - A brief summary of what is currently happening with the AppResult or Sample that will be displayed for the user next to the status. This may be updated multiple times. This field has a limit of 128 characters
        Returns:
        the appsession single item response

        ResourceForbiddenException

      • startMultipartUpload

        GetFileResponse startMultipartUpload(AppResultCompact appresult,
                                   String fileName,
                                   String contentType,
                                   String directory)
        Change or create files within a particular AppResult

        Permissions: WRITE access to the AppResult to which the file belongs
        Parameters:
        appresult - appresult which will contain the file
        fileName - The name of the file as it will be in the AppResult
        contentType - the content type of the file being uploaded. This header is required. When downloading this file, the same Content-Type will be returned.
        directory - Use if the data has a directory structure. This will create a directory within the AppResult to place this file.
        Returns:
        the file single item response

      • uploadFilePart

        GetFileUploadResponse uploadFilePart(FileCompact file,
                                   int partNumber,
                                   String MD5Hash,
                                   InputStream part)
        To upload file parts to the particular file Id. Parts may be uploaded in parallel and, in the event that the connection fails, the upload for each part may be retried. The parts will be sorted in ascending order regardless of the order of upload (i.e. part 5 can be uploaded before part 4, but will still be sorted normally once fully uploaded).

        Permissions: WRITE access to the particular file
        Parameters:
        file - file for which part will be uploaded
        partNumber - Each part must be numbered from 1 to 10000, when uploaded the file's parts will be sorted in ascending order.
        MD5Hash - A base64 encoded 128bit MD5 checksum may be provided prior to the upload, which will be checked by the server. By providing a computed value, an app can ensure that the checksum is matched after upload. If the server-calculated value does not match the provided value, the upload will be rejected. Although it is optional, it is highly recommended to ensure data integrity after upload
        part - stream for the part
        Returns:
        the file upload single item response

      • setMultipartUploadStatus

        GetFileResponse setMultipartUploadStatus(FileCompact file,
                                       UploadStatus status)
        This method is used to change the upload status for a multi-part file upload

        Permissions: WRITE access to the particular file that will be changed
        Parameters:
        file - file for which status will be changed
        status - The status of the upload
        Returns:
        the file single item response

      • getFileRedirectMetaData

        GetFileRedirectMetaDataResponse getFileRedirectMetaData(FileCompact file)
        Get file redirect metadata for a file
        Parameters:
        file -
        Returns:
        the single response

      • download

        void download(File file,
            File target,
            DownloadListener listener)
        Download the contents of a file

        Permissions: READ access to the Run, Sample, or AppResult to which the file belongs
        Parameters:
        file - the which will be downloaded
        targetFolder - local path which is the target of the download. If target is a file, the source contents will be copied to that file. If target is a directory, a file with the same name as the source file will be created in the target folder and its contents copied
        listener - optional (can be null)listener to be notified of download events

        Returns:

      • getVariantSet

        GetVariantSetResponse getVariantSet(File file)
        Retrieve a variant set

        Permissions: BROWSE access to the file
        Parameters:
        file - the vcf file on which to query
        Returns:
        the variantset single item response

      • getVariants

        ListVariantsResponse getVariants(File file,
                               String chromosome,
                               PositionalQueryParams params)
        Retrieve variants in a specific chromosome

        Permissions: READ access to the AppResult to which the source file belongs
        Parameters:
        file - the vcf file on which to perform query
        chromosome - The chromosome within which the variantset will be analyzed.
        params - positional query for the variant
        Returns:
        the variant list response

      • getVariantRawRecord

        String getVariantRawRecord(FileCompact file,
                         String chromosome,
                         PositionalQueryParams params)
        Retrieve variants in a specific chromosome

        Permissions: READ access to the AppResult to which the source file belongs
        Parameters:
        file - the vcf file on which to perform query
        chromosome - The chromosome within which the variantset will be analyzed.
        params - positional query for the variant
        Returns:
        a string containing 0..n records from the vcf file delimited according to the vcf specification

      • getCoverage

        GetCoverageResponse getCoverage(File file,
                              String chromosome,
                              CoverageParams params)
        Retrieve coverage data in a specific chromosome

        Permissions: READ access to the sample to which the source file belongs
        Parameters:
        file - the bam file on which to perform query
        chromosome - The chromosome within which the coverage will be analyzed
        params - coverage parameters
        Returns:
        the coverage single item response

      • getCoverageMetaData

        GetCoverageMetadataResponse getCoverageMetaData(File file,
                                              String chromosome)
        Retrieve metadata about the coverage in a chromosome

        Permissions: READ access to the sample to which the source file belongs
        Parameters:
        file - the bam file on which to perform query
        chromosome - The chromosome within which the coverage will be analyzed
        Returns:
        the coverage metadata single item response

        Parameters:

      • getPurchase

        GetPurchaseResponse getPurchase(String id)
                                throws ResourceNotFoundException,
                                       ResourceForbiddenException
        Retrieve a specific purchase by its Id. You will only receive a response if you are the app owner or the user of the purchase
        Parameters:
        id - purchase id
        Returns:
        the purchase single item response
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException
        ResourceForbiddenException

      • createPurchase

        CreatePurchaseResponse createPurchase(AppSessionCompact appsession,
                                    ProductCompact[] products)
        Initiate a purchase for the user. Use this method to begin the process of charging a user for the application. When creating a purchase, keep your access_token and RefundSecret for your records, your app will need these in order to issue a Refund on a Purchase
        Parameters:
        appsession - The AppSession that this Purchase is associated with
        products - An array of the Products that are part of this Purchase
        Returns:
        the create purchase single item response

      • createRefund

        GetRefundResponse createRefund(String purchaseId,
                             String refundSecret,
                             String comment)
        To refund this purchase and give the user their iCredits back
        Parameters:
        purchaseId - Id of the purchase that will be refunded
        refundSecret - The RefundSecret provided in the Response from the POST: purchases request
        comment - An optional comment can be added for this refund
        Returns:
        the create refund single item response
